alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Western Crawford County in northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen and additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harmonsburg, Conneaut Lake and Conneaut Lakeshore. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
